definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: It was radical when Fourier wrote it in 1808.
sentences.chinese: 但1808年，傅里葉寫下的這句話卻顯得尤爲激進。

sentences.english: The paper presents encrpytion techniques of double random phase based on anamorphic fractional Fourier transform.
sentences.chinese: 提出變形分數傅里葉變換雙隨機相位編碼技術。

sentences.english: The relation between the system parameters and the order of fractional Fourier transform implemented were derived.
sentences.chinese: 推導了系統結構參數與分數傅里葉變換的級次的關係。

sentences.english: A half-wave symmetric function contains only odd harmonics .
sentences.chinese: 半波對稱函數的傅里葉級數只含有奇次諧波分量。

sentences.english: Yes, FFT is Fast Fourier Transform.
sentences.chinese: 即我們常說的快速傅里葉變化。

sentences.english: The phase error caused by leakage in a 3- D object measurement Fourier transform profilometry (FTP) method is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了頻譜泄漏對傅里葉變換輪廓術測量精度的影響。

sentences.english: The Fourier transformation is used to calculate the propagating constants of the Si waveguides.
sentences.chinese: 應用傅里葉交換法計算了硅光波導中導模的傳播常數。

sentences.english: In addition, Fourier finite difference operator is optimized desirably.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文對傅里葉有限差分算子作了必要的優化。

sentences.english: The simplest expression of constructing recipe for SFFs is deduced.
sentences.chinese: 最後，導出了構造自傅里葉函數法則的最簡表達式。

sentences.english: Implementation of anamorphic FRT using HOE is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出用全息元件實現變形分數傅里葉變換。

sentences.english: Epoxy conversion was measured also by FT-NIR.
sentences.chinese: 環氧轉換測量也傅里葉變換近紅外。

sentences.english: The formulations of the response are developed from the those of the frequence-domain by the Fourier transform.
sentences.chinese: 用傅里葉變換由頻率域公式導出了時間域的響應公式。

sentences.english: Fourier Descriptors (FDs) is an important method used in shape analysis and recognition.
sentences.chinese: 傅里葉描述子是分析和識別物體形狀的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: A revised 2D Fourier-wavelet descriptor for the object recognition is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種二維傅里葉小波描述子。
